channel.title: CVE Feed for Real WYSIWYG -- Real WYSIWYG
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Real WYSIWYG -- Real WYSIWYG

item.title: CVE-2021-39310|2024-09-17T01:22:05.822Z -- real%20wysiwyg -- real%20wysiwyg
item.description: The Real WYSIWYG WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of PHP_SELF in the ~/real-wysiwyg.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.0.2.
